resources.string: Search for the place where you want to go (EX. mall, multiplex, office, apartment ect.) and select a Parking Place.
Book a parking slot at that place with time period you want with online payment.
When you reach at the place, Scan the QR code there with this app to Enter, and you have your parking spot ready for you.
Once you are finish with your work, you can leave the place just by scanning the QR code at EXIT.
